version_description:
- Import images from Adobe Creative Cloud Libraries.
- Share images to Creative Cloud Libraries.
- Create new custom looks (My Looks) and apply it to photos right from your iPhone camera app
- Edit more easily on iPhone 6 and 6 Plus as images now utilize more of the screen space.

IMAGE PICKER:
The image picker makes it fast and easy to browse and select recently edited photos.

Bug Fixes

Major user-requested feature/updates:
1. Adobe Photoshop Express Collages! Automatically create stunning high-quality and share-worthy collages with powerful Intelligent Layout and Style Transfer automation options. (This isn’t your usual phony photo layout app).

2. Google photo integration: Select and import images in your Google Photos account, edit in Photoshop Express, and share or export.
Bug fixes and enhancements.
Bug fixes and enhancements.
Bug fixes and enhancements.

· Easily post to more social channels with new crop ratios for Twitter, LinkedIn and Etsy.
· Redo feature added to phone.
· New Saturation feature gives you more control of your images.
· Bug fixes and enhancements.

Editing/Collage workflow enhancements
•Refined and enhanced looks and corrections workflow make the navigation experience seamless.
•More than 25 new stunning looks from Black and White, Portrait, Nature, and Duo Tones.
•Add timeless quality to your images with the new Black and White corrections, along with Reduce Luminance and Reduce Color Noise.
•For a harmonious look, match the border color with the colors in the image.
•Now edit TIFF images seamlessly.
•Automatic collage: Choose from auto-suggested collage outputs to save time in creating a collage.
•Enhanced widget: Now get surprised with the auto-generated collage suggestions inside the app widget.

Saving/Sharing workflow enhancements
•Easily add custom text or graphical watermark on top of images.
•Enhanced sharing experience allows one-click sharing to multiple destinations. Also, share to newly added destinations, like Facebook Messenger, Line, and Sina Weibo.
•Directly save your images to Lightroom.
•Uninterrupted printing from within the Photoshop Express app.
•Saving collages with better resolution is no more a problem. Get a crisp collage output now.

•Bug fixes & stability improvements

Previous Notes:

Editing/Collage workflow enhancements
•Refined and enhanced looks and corrections workflow make the navigation experience seamless.
•More than 25 new stunning looks from Black and White, Portrait, Nature, and Duo Tones.
•Add timeless quality to your images with the new Black and White corrections, along with Reduce Luminance and Reduce Color Noise.
•For a harmonious look, match the border color with the colors in the image.
•Now edit TIFF images seamlessly.
•Automatic collage: Choose from auto-suggested collage outputs to save time in creating a collage.
•Enhanced widget: Now get surprised with the auto-generated collage suggestions inside the app widget.

Saving/Sharing workflow enhancements
•Easily add custom text or graphical watermark on top of images.
•Enhanced sharing experience allows one-click sharing to multiple destinations. Also, share to newly added destinations, like Facebook Messenger, Line, and Sina Weibo.
•Directly save your images to Lightroom.
•Uninterrupted printing from within the Photoshop Express app.
•Saving collages with better resolution is no more a problem. Get a crisp collage output now.

· New Duotone looks to give a boost to your creativity.
· New aspect ratios added for Facebook Page Cover, Facebook Event Cover, Facebook Ad, Twitter Header, YouTube Thumbnail, YouTube Channel Art, Pinterest etc so that you can easily use your photos on social channels.
· Bug fixes and stability improvements.

• Introducing Text – Adding one of the most demanded features. You can now add text and create incredible memes, using a variety of fonts, colors, and transparency options.
• Perspective Correction – Fix those skewed perspective photos with just a click! Choose from auto (balanced or full auto), vertical, or horizontal correction options.
• Collage Enhancements – Collage workflow is enhanced to let you create even more stunning collages.
- Pop Color – Accentuate a single color in your collage automatically. The results are mesmerizing. Do try it out!
- New Layouts – Awesome layout options including freeform layouts are added for creating spectacular collages.
- New Backgrounds - Breathtaking backgrounds are added to further enhance your collages.
• JPEG Quality output – Customize the quality and size of your output image.
• Experience Enhancements – We love it when you love to use our app. We’ve tweaked and enhanced the overall editing experience to make it more enjoyable and simple for you.
• Help Section - Added for guiding you on various functionalities in the app.

• Introducing Text – Now you can now add text and create incredible memes, using a variety of fonts, colours, and transparency options.
• Perspective Correction – Fix those skewed perspective photos with just a click! Choose from auto (balanced or full auto), vertical, or horizontal correction options.
• Collage Enhancements – Collage workflow has been enhanced to let you create even more stunning collages.
- Pop Colour – Accentuate a single colour in your collage automatically. The results are unbelievable. Try it out!
- New Layouts – Fantastic layout options including freeform layouts have been added for creating spectacular collages.
- New Backgrounds - Breathtaking backgrounds have been added to further enhance your collages.
• JPEG Quality output – Customize the quality and size of your output image.
• Experience Enhancements – We want you to love using our app, so we’ve enhanced the overall editing experience to make it simpler.
• Help Section – All the help you need to guide you on various functionalities in the app.

version_description:
What's New in Version 6.0.3
Bug Fixes and Stability Improvements

What's New in Version 6.0.1
• Introducing Text – Adding one of the most in-demand features. You can now add text and create incredible memes, using a variety of fonts, colours, and transparency options.
• Perspective Correction – Fix those skewed perspective photos with just a click! Choose from auto (balanced or full auto), vertical, or horizontal correction options.
• Collage Enhancements – Collage workflow is enhanced to let you create even more stunning collages.
- Pop Colour – Accentuate a single colour in your collage automatically. The results are mesmerizing. Do try it out!
- New Layouts – Awesome layout options including freeform layouts are added for creating spectacular collages.
- New Backgrounds – Breathtaking backgrounds are added to further enhance your collages.
• JPEG Quality Output – Customize the quality and size of your output image.
• Experience Enhancements – We love it when you love to use our app. We’ve tweaked and enhanced the overall editing experience to make it more enjoyable and simpler for you.
• Help Section - Added to guide you through various functionalities of the app.

version_description:
What's New in Version 6.0.4
Bug Fixes and Stability Improvements

What's New in Version 6.0.1
• Introducing Text – Adding one of the most in-demand features. You can now add text and create incredible memes, using a variety of fonts, colours, and transparency options.
• Perspective Correction – Fix those skewed perspective photos with just a click! Choose from auto (balanced or full auto), vertical, or horizontal correction options.
• Collage Enhancements – Collage workflow is enhanced to let you create even more stunning collages.
- Pop Colour – Accentuate a single colour in your collage automatically. The results are mesmerizing. Do try it out!
- New Layouts – Awesome layout options including freeform layouts are added for creating spectacular collages.
- New Backgrounds – Breathtaking backgrounds are added to further enhance your collages.
• JPEG Quality Output – Customize the quality and size of your output image.
• Experience Enhancements – We love it when you love to use our app. We’ve tweaked and enhanced the overall editing experience to make it more enjoyable and simpler for you.
• Help Section - Added to guide you through various functionalities of the app.

What's New in Version 6.0.5
Bug Fixes and Stability Improvements

What's New in Version 6.0.1
• Introducing Text – Adding one of the most in-demand features. You can now add text and create incredible memes, using a variety of fonts, colours, and transparency options.
• Perspective Correction – Fix those skewed perspective photos with just a click! Choose from auto (balanced or full auto), vertical, or horizontal correction options.
• Collage Enhancements – Collage workflow is enhanced to let you create even more stunning collages.
- Pop Colour – Accentuate a single colour in your collage automatically. The results are mesmerizing. Do try it out!
- New Layouts – Awesome layout options including freeform layouts are added for creating spectacular collages.
- New Backgrounds – Breathtaking backgrounds are added to further enhance your collages.
• JPEG Quality Output – Customize the quality and size of your output image.
• Experience Enhancements – We love it when you love to use our app. We’ve tweaked and enhanced the overall editing experience to make it more enjoyable and simpler for you.
• Help Section - Added to guide you through various functionalities of the app.
.   Text Support in Collage – Now you can add text to your Collages.

. Enhance your Collages by adding fun and interesting artwork
. Delete unwanted images directly from the Image Picker
. Send to Photoshop – Take your creation from here to Photoshop for a full-blown and seamless editing experience. All edits are exposed as layers in Photoshop, giving you total control. This great set of world-class tools opens up infinite possibilities which will take your creation to the next level.
. Bug Fixes and feature Enhancements

. Enhance your Collages by adding fun and interesting artwork
. Delete unwanted images directly from the Image Picker
. Send to Photoshop – Take your creation from here to Photoshop for a full-blown and seamless editing experience. All edits are exposed as layers in Photoshop, giving you total control. This great set of world-class tools opens up infinite possibilities which will take your creation to the next level.
. Bug Fixes and feature Enhancements

. We now support 8 new languages (Greek, Romanian, Indonesian , Vietnamese , Malay , Filipino , Thai , Ukrainian).
. Add multiple texts in your collages for an enhanced effect.
. New save options in settings: Now you can replace the original image and undo it from iOS Photos app.
. Bug fixes and quality improvements to enhance the editing experience.

. Love is in the air! Use the new special Valentine’s Day stickers in collage to express your care for your loved ones!
. Now all your Photoshop Express edited images and collages are stored in a separate album. So easy to find!
. Bug fixes and quality improvements to enhance the editing experience.

. We now support 8 new languages (Greek, Romanian, Indonesian , Vietnamese , Malay , Filipino , Thai , Ukrainian).
. Add multiple texts in your collages for an enhanced effect.
. New save options in settings: Now you can replace the original image and undo it from iOS Photos app.
. Bug fixes and quality improvements to enhance the editing experience.

. Add a sentimental feeling or evoke nostalgia to your images using the Vignette effect.
. Add groovy stickers and multiple texts in your Image for an heightened and enhanced effect.
. Seamless experience provided for importing your images from Lightroom and editing them further in PSX.
. Bug fixes and quality improvements to enhance the editing experience.

. Single Image Collages – Create trendy single image collages in a single tap.
. Resume Collage – Now never lose a collage session that you had to leave in between. It’ll be auto saved and you may resume from where you left.
. Fade Correction: Blend images with the background using the new “Fade” tool and give a matte feel to your photos
. Full Screen Navigation – Now choosing the image to edit on is much easier than before. You can swipe left/right to move to previous/next image inside editor.
. Unleash the power of Photoshop (CC) on your mobile using Connect to Photoshop functionality.

. Single Image Collages – Create trendy single image collages in a single tap.
. Resume Collage – Now never lose a collage session that you had to leave in between. It’ll be auto saved and you may resume from where you left.
. Fade Correction: Blend images with the background using the new “Fade” tool and give a matte feel to your photos
. Full Screen Navigation – Now choosing the image to edit on is much easier than before. You can swipe left/right to move to previous/next image inside editor.
. Unleash the power of Photoshop (CC) on your mobile using Connect to Photoshop functionality.

. Bug Fixes and feature Enhancements

6.5.1
. Single Image Collages – Create trendy single image collages in a single tap.
. Resume Collage – Now never lose a collage session that you had to leave in between. It’ll be auto saved and you may resume from where you left.
. Fade Correction: Blend images with the background using the new “Fade” tool and give a matte feel to your photos
. Full Screen Navigation – Now choosing the image to edit on is much easier than before. You can swipe left/right to move to previous/next image inside editor.
. Unleash the power of Photoshop (CC) on your mobile using Connect to Photoshop functionality.

. New Looks : Added new ‘Charm’ category of looks to make your images charming!
. Spot Heal Enhancement : Now you can control the spot radius during Spot Heal, for better precision and control.
. Fonts Customization : Choose from a wide variety of fonts to enhance the text in your images and collages.
. Bug fixes and enhancements for an heightened experience.
.  Bug Fixes and feature Enhancements

. Blur – Use Blur effect to give your images a surreal and enhanced effect.
. Revert to Original – Now revert your changes to the original image in one step and save on numerous Undo steps.
. Image Info – See the image information extracted from the image’s EXIF data, right from the editor itself.
. Bug fixes and enhancements for a heightened experience.

. Grain Effect – Give a vintage effect to your images using the new Grain adjustment option.
. Improved performance of the application while opening images.
. Minor enhancements and quality improvements.

. Discover Feed - Share your best moments or be inspired and learn from the Photoshop creative community. Wondering how an image was made? Long press to see the before and after, copy and apply edits from other people’s images to your own, or contribute your unique take by remixing #FreeToRemix photos.
. Save/Share Image as a square – Now you can save your image as a square aspect ratio without cropping the image.
. Configure Save Settings – Allow configuration of Image properties such as Size, Quality and Watermark from Share Screen just before save.
. Save as PDF – Save your images as a PDF for easy sharing and collaboration.
. Shadow support – Add shadows to images in Collage to give them a realistic effect.
. Action Extension – Launch Photoshop Express from Share Button.
. Bug fixes for iPhone XS and iPhone XS Max.

. Edit workflow:
. HSL Tool in Corrections – Use HSL tool to selectively change colours in your photo.
. Blend Effects – Create stunning outputs with new blend effects. These are 89 new pre blended effects spanning into eight different categories Light-leaks, Bokeh, Grunge, Rain drops, Paper and Water-color.
. HDR Looks Category – Try out the new HDR looks category for dramatic effects.
. Discover Feed:
. Sharing post to social media – Now easily share your posts to your friends and family from the Discover feed to various social media platforms.
. Improvement in Playback – View greater details on borders and looks during playback.
. Watermark resize – Have complete control over the size of the watermark on your images. A much requested functionality, humbly delivered!
. New Creative content – As always new content in Looks, Stickers, Collage layouts and Text styles have been added to provide you with inspiration to create awesome images. Give them a try!

. Watermark Positioning – Providing the freedom to place the watermark at the desired location.
. Text Stroke – Stand out with creative text strokes. It also enhances the clarity of the text.
. Stability and performance improvements for an enhanced creativity experience.

. Editor enhancements – Now you can place text and stickers on top of borders.
. Project support in Collage Workflow – Now you can save the collages and edit it later.
. Support for Google Photos – Now import your images from Google Photos and create magic in Photoshop Express
. New Matte Looks - Check out looks under the new category - "Matte".
. New Text styles - Try out some new text styles added.
. New Stickers - We have added a new stickers category - "Emoticons".

. Enhanced Vignette workflow – New modern UI for precise control of changing roundness and feather. Play around with the amount field and mid-point for enhanced and dramatic effects.
. Discover feed enhancements - Learn and be inspired! Follow your favorite artist and playback their image-editing steps on your photos and inside your app editor for similar magic. A very unique and exciting feature. Not to be missed!
. New content - New looks, text styles, borders, stickers and layouts has been added in the application.
. Performance improvements and bug fixes.

. Enhanced Vignette workflow – New modern UI for precise control of changing roundness and feather. Play around with the amount field and mid-point for enhanced and dramatic effects.
. Discover feed enhancements - Learn and be inspired! Follow your favorite artist and playback their image-editing steps on your photos and inside your app editor for similar magic. A very unique and exciting feature. Not to be missed!
. New content - New looks, text styles, borders, stickers and layouts has been added in the application.
. Performance improvements and bug fixes.

. Watermark workflow Enhancements : Now you can place watermark at various pre-set positions and add/remove the background for watermark. You can also choose from our list of predefined watermarks.
. Bug fixes for better experience.

. Improved Auto Enhance : Auto Enhance has been completely reworked to create better results, every time. Using an advanced neural network powered by Adobe Sensei, the new Auto Enhance creates a better photo by analyzing your photo and comparing to tens of thousands of professionally edited photos to create a beautiful, pleasing image.
. Performance improvement and bug fixes.

. Improved Auto Enhance : Auto Enhance has been completely reworked to create better results, every time. Using an advanced neural network powered by Adobe Sensei, the new Auto Enhance creates a better photo by analyzing your photo and comparing to tens of thousands of professionally edited photos to create a beautiful, pleasing image.
. Performance improvement and bug fixes.

. Split Tone - Use Split Tone to stylize your photos through color tints in the highlights and shadows.
. Search and Hashtag in Discover feed – Now you can search for the images in Discover feed.

. Enhanced Vignette workflow – New modern UI for precise control of changing roundness and feather. Play around with the amount field and mid-point for enhanced and dramatic effects.

Bug fixes and stability improvements.

We’ve added a ton of new features and improvements across recent updates, including:

• Automatic Compositing – Updated and refined “Mix” workflow. Automatically cut out and refine, combine and blend images with multiple layers.
• Smart Cutout – Simply draw a rectangle around an object to automatically cut out the object from the background and refine selection.
• Custom Stickers – Automatically cut out and turn any photo into a personalised sticker.
• Replace Eyes – Open closed eyes when someone blinks to always capture the perfect moment.
• Selective Editing – Automatically select and adjust one part of an image while leaving the rest intact, powered by Adobe Sensei.
• Advanced Healing – Quickly remove unwanted marks, spots or parts of an image with control and precision.
• Scrapbook – Automatically cut out multiple images, generating stickers to create a scrapbook collage.
• Style Transfer – Copy a style from your image (or use a pre-set style) to apply to all photos in a collage.
• Discover – Use Remix, Playback and Copy Edits in the Discover feed to learn from inspirational artists in the community.
• New Collage Themes – check out our stunning new collage themes with unique layouts and background patterns, including freeform shapes and style transfer effects.

• Discover - Use Remix, Playback, and Copy Edits in the Discover feed to learn from inspirational artists in the community.
• New Collage Themes – check out our stunning new collage themes with unique layouts and background patterns, including freeform shapes and style transfer effects.

We’ve added a ton of new features and improvements across recent updates, including:

• Automatic Compositing – Updated and refined \“Mix\” workflow. Automatically cut out and refine, combine, and blend images with multiple layers.
• Smart Cutout - Simply draw a rectangle around an object to automatically cutout the object from the background and refine selection.[Premium only]
• Custom Stickers – Automatically cut out and turn any photo into a personalized sticker.[Premium only]
• Replace Eyes – Open closed eyes when someone blinks to always capture the perfect moment.[Premium only]
• Selective Editing – Automatically select and adjust one part of an image while leaving the rest intact, powered by Adobe Sensei.
• Advanced Healing - Quickly remove unwanted marks, spots or parts of an image with control and precision.[Premium only]
• Scrapbook – Automatically cutout multiple images, generating stickers to create a scrapbook collage.[Premium only]
• Style Transfer – Copy a style from your image (or use a pre-set style) to apply to all photos in a collage.
• Discover - Use Remix, Playback, and Copy Edits in the Discover feed to learn from inspirational artists in the community.
• New Collage Themes – check out our stunning new collage themes with unique layouts and background patterns, including freeform shapes and style transfer effects.

Improvements to the design interface to increase accessibility and make the user’s experience more intuitive including:

• Making it easier to access a wide range of print and social media templates as well as collage layouts
• Expanding the content view (overlays, stickers, texts, borders) to full screen
• Simplifying the options for adding text as well as our automatic cutout feature

Bug fixes
Stability improvements

We’re continuously adding new features and improvements across our different workflows.

• Edit: enhance your photos with selective editing, advanced healing, looks, and more
• Collage: combine photos with multiple layouts and themes, including freeform shapes, style transfer effects, and scrapbook collages
• Mix: automatically cut out and refine, combine, and blend images with multiple layers
• Discover feed: learn from inspirational artists in the community with Remix, Playback, and Copy Edits
• Content: add extra creativity to your photos with fun themes, stickers, text, borders, backgrounds, and overlays
